channel.title: Lithuania on Baltic Security Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Lithuania on Baltic Security Foundation

item.title: Lithuania-Kaliningrad Transit Row: A Broader EU and NATO Perspective
item.description: Through much of the end of June, Lithuania has been embroiled in a row with Russia over the implementation of EU sanctions on certain kinds of goods in transit between Russia and its Kaliningrad exclave.

item.title: The Belarusian Migrant Crisis in Broader Geopolitical Context
item.description: For about the last two months, Lithuania has been in the throes of a migration crisis like it has never seen before.

item.title: Defending the Suwałki Gap
item.description: At the end of last month, Lithuania and Poland announced that the two countries would each assign a brigade to NATO Headquarters in Poland to “train and act together” for the defense of the Suwałki Gap.
